title: A Call to LA Typophiles: Report on the House Eames Event
content: People in LA should attend the [sneak preview](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019044527/http:/www.houseind.com/showandtell/index.php?id=396) of House Industries' Eames project and post photos here. I'm itching to know what they're working on.
author: Stephen Coles

comments.content:
I would oblige, except I'll be on Crete.

hhp
Could I have some information on the Eames Project. I used to do work for Charles & Rae Eames when they had studio in an old livery garage in Venice, CA.

I wish I knew more, Robert. The only information is what is shown on that flyer.

What did you do for them? You might enjoy my [Mid-Century Modern blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019044527/http:/mid-mod.com/).
Stephen, check that link. Something not right.
Haha! I guess I don't know my alternate URL as well as I should. Fixed.
So not a single Typophile heeded the call, eh?
